comments.body:
Uh-oh. Looks like bad things can happen after all when loading the options module while in combat.

I'm probably going to have to come up with a better way to allow configuration while in combat. It will probably involve a setting in the main options that will allow config mode in combat, and will also force the options module to pre-load, since that would be the only reliable way to let users configure while in combat if they have not yet loaded the options in the current session.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Fixed/added/whatever in r639
